byline.contributor: Saeed Al-Batati reported from Al Mukalla and Kareem Fahim from Cairo.
byline.original: By SAEED AL-BATATI and KAREEM FAHIM

abstract: Fighters from Al Qaeda in Arabian Peninsula storm Al Mukalla, Yemen, capturing large part of city and raising fears of broader expansion by Sunni extremists.
lead_paragraph: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula stormed Al Mukalla while Yemen’s attention has been on the escalating fighting with Houthi rebels.

headline.main: Affiliate of Al Qaeda Seizes Major Yemeni City, Driving Out the Military
headline.print_headline: Qaeda Affiliate Pushes Military Out of Major Yemeni City

snippet: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula stormed Al Mukalla while Yemen’s attention has been on the escalating fighting with Houthi rebels.

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
keywords.name: organizations
